headline: Allstate (ALL) Is Up 5.1% After Strong Q3 Earnings and Share Buyback Announcement
summary: Allstate reported third-quarter earnings results on November 5, 2025, with revenue of US$17.26 billion and net income of US$3.75 billion, both up significantly from a year earlier, while also completing a buyback of 1.78 million shares for US$359.96 million in the third quarter. The earnings release highlighted substantial year-over-year growth in both revenue and profitability, reflecting stronger operational performance and confidence in capital management through continued share...
